name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Driven Full Stack Developer with 8 years of experience, specializing in **Python** and **TypeScript**, adept at creating robust **REST APIs** and developing scalable solutions. I have a demonstrated capability in **speech-to-text** technology, **embeddings**, and **diarization**, which enhances user interaction and data processing. My technical problem-solving skills enable me to tackle complex challenges efficiently, while my client interaction and business acumen ensure solutions are aligned with user needs and business objectives.
I possess extensive expertise in building high-performance solutions particularly in healthcare and financial sectors, employing **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. With a deep understanding of cloud services in **Azure** and **AWS**, I’ve successfully led the development of enterprise platforms integrating AI/ML capabilities for advanced analytics and automation. My experience with microservices architecture, CI/CD automation, and compliance frameworks such as HIPAA and PCI DSS ensures the security and reliability of the applications I create.
Additionally, I have hands-on experience in developing machine learning pipelines and implementing MLOps workflows using tools such as **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**, further showcasing my ability to leverage technology for innovative solutions.
